00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include <malloc.h>
00043 #include "mensagem.h"

00050 #ifdef __curved_env__
00051 
00052 CURVE *MSD_lowNewCurve(CNAME what, SPTYPE s)
00053 {
00054    CURVE *newcurv;
00055 
00056    if ((newcurv = (CURVE *)malloc(sizeof(CURVE))) == (CURVE *)NIL)
00057    {
00058       fprintf(stderr, MEN_NaoPossuiMemoria, NAM_NewLine);
00059       return((CURVE *)NIL);
00060    }
00061 
00062    newcurv->nextc = SolCurv(s);
00063    newcurv->prevc = (CURVE *)NIL;
00064    if (SolCurv(s) != (CURVE *)NIL)
00065    {
00066       SolCurv(s)->prevc = newcurv;
00067    }
00068    SolCurv(s)          = newcurv;
00069    newcurv->tag_type   = what;
00070    newcurv->times_used = 0;
00071 
00072    return(newcurv);
00073 }
00074 
00075 #endif
